Dialogue.Value: Genso Report Network!,Trust GRN with your,morning news!
Net crime rates have,been on the rise over,the past few days.
It is suspected that a,criminal group called,ROM is involved.
The World Net Police，,NetAgents，and others would,like to keep you informed.
ROM is named after,Read Only Memory.
We’re aware of their activities，,but it seems unlikely that they,will be stopped anytime soon.
Expect tighter security from,NetAgents moving forward
Thanks for gettin’ Patchouli,for me!,Now I can open the store!
I’m busy ’til the grand openin’，,so I’ll hafta thank ya in person,later!
Sorry about before.,It’s hard for me to be,honest in person.
Sakuya even scolded me,about it afterwards.
Looking back，I’ve done,some awful things.,I’ll reflect on my actions.
It’s not the most refined,apology，but I’ll give you,my P-Code.
If you’d like to play，please,come over to my house.
We simply must Netbattle,again! Sakuya is looking,forward to it too.
Well then，see you later.
Alice，I have several things,I need to tell you about the,data you brought me.
It’s difficult to explain by email.,Sorry to trouble you，but could,you please stop by my lab?
The chip shop is now open,next to the Genso Town,metro station!
From Battle Chips to AddOns，,there’s a lot to see! So come,on by ’n take a look!
P.S.,Blondie，be sure to drop by,so I can thank ya in person!
I will now explain Style,Changes，which can be,acquired through battle.
When you’re in the Custom,Screen，press UP to open,the Style Menu.
You can freely switch,between any Styles that,you’ve acquired.
It’s important to note that you,can only switch to a certain,Style once per battle.
Also，you can change Styles,as often as you want outside,of battle.
It’s possible that you can,acquire new Styles as you,battle!
Switching your Styles to suit,the situation can give you an,edge in your battles!
Lady Shanghai，please allow,me to explain how to use,the Virus Ball.
First，as I said earlier，,the Virus Ball is a tool,for catching viruses.
If you land the finishing blow,on a virus with the Virus Ball，,you’ll catch that virus!
Caught viruses can be,found in the ”Virus” tab,in the START menu.
There，you can raise your,virus by feeding it various,kinds of frags.
The virus can only eat up,to 50 frags in total.
You can manage viruses,you’ve caught with the,equipment in Alice’s HP.
Please be sure to try,depositing and withdrawing,viruses.
Once you’ve caught a virus，,the Virus Ball chip changes,into a virus summoning chip.
Depositing the virus will,change the chip back to,the Virus Ball.
By the way，each virus can,have a different code.
The same kind of virus might,have different codes，so keep,that in mind!
A newly caught virus will,start at Level 1.
So it might be a good idea,to catch weaker viruses.
Please allow me to briefly,explain Dark Chips.
It seems like your heart is,separated from Alice when,using a Dark Chip.
That said，you’ll return to,normal after you use the,Dark Chip，so don’t worry!
Dark Chips shroud your heart，,so you won’t be able to enter,Full Synchro.
If you’re concerned about,other downsides，don’t worry!
The only other downside is,that a folder can only hold,one Dark Chip.
That’s everything!,Sorry for the long messages!
It’s finally time for the,tournament!,See you in the finals!
Good luck in the N1 League!,I’ll be cheering for you!
You’re in the N1 League，,right? I can’t watch，but,I’ll be rootin’ for ya!
It’ll be fine!,You’re Alice Shinki!,You got this!
Good luck!,I’ll be cheering for you,from home! I will!
Sorry to send you mail so,early in the morning，Alice.
I have to go to the Agent,Center again this afternoon!
So I guess I’m going,with you again today!
I’m sending this from the,hospital.
After my treatment，I just,have to rest and heal.
I’m going to be in the hospital,for a week on bed rest.
But thanks to you，Reimu,and her shrine are okay!
Thank you so much，Alice!
P.S. The hospital is boring，,so I’d love it if you paid me,a visit!
This email was automatically,sent to those who bought the,Chip Folder Starter Pack!
I’m Ms. Famous from,the Japan Netbattlers’,Association!
When you get a chip，you can,add it to a chip folder from,the START menu.
But you can’t put just anything,into a chip folder.
A standard chip’s size,determines how many,can fit in a chip folder.
For chips smaller than 19MB，,you can fit 5 into a folder.
20-29MB，4 per folder.,30-39MB，3 per folder.,40-49MB，2 per folder.
For chips larger than 50MB，,you can only fit 1 into a folder.
Since these rules only apply,to chips with the same name，,you can have multiple
50MB chips with different,names in the same folder.
However，only 5 blue Navi,chips of any kind are allowed,in a folder.
Those of you with many,NetBattling friends,should memorize this!
That said，please learn the,rules and enjoy building your,folders!
Fighter Style,Detailed Explanation....
◆ Change Conditions ◆,Use buster,Use breaking chips
◆ Special Abilities ◆,Buster power x2,Non-elemental chips +10
◆ Charge: Fighter Punch ◆,2 panel breaking punch,knocks enemies back
Ninja Style,Detailed Explanation....
◆ Change Conditions ◆,End battles quickly,Use sword chips
◆ Special Abilities 1 ◆,At MaxCharge，step with chip,Faster movement
◆ Special Abilities 2 ◆,Swords and charge shot,can reflect enemy attacks
◆ Charge: Element Sword ◆,Elemental sword with a wide,slash
Doctor Style,Detailed Explanation....
◆ Change Conditions ◆,Use ADD; Use PAs,Use Power+ chips
◆ Special Abilities 1 ◆,Custom +1,Can pick 6 chips per turn
◆ Special Abilities 2 ◆,Can ADD up to 12 chips
◆ Charge: Injection Tray ◆,Inject enemy with your,element’s status
Gaia Style,Detailed Explanation....
◆ Change Conditions 1 ◆,Take damage,Use shield chips
◆ Change Conditions 2 ◆,Use object chips
◆ Special Abilities 1 ◆,Cross-shaped terrain on,first turn
◆ Special Abilities 2 ◆,Damage while standing,still is halved
◆ Charge: Element Quake ◆,Quake third panel ahead and,turn into an elemental panel
Wing Style,Detailed Explanation....
◆ Change Conditions 1 ◆,Move onto elemental panels,Use panel-changing chips
◆ Change Conditions 2 ◆,Use panel-cracking chips
◆Special Abilities 1◆,Unaffected by holes，winds，,and special panels
◆ Special Abilities 2 ◆,Once per turn，with no chips,left，press A to evade
◆ Charge: Tornado ◆,8 hits 2 panels ahead!,Improved by sand panels
Witch Style,Detailed Explanation....
◆ Change Conditions ◆,Use elemental chips,Exploit enemy weakness
◆ Special Abilities 1 ◆,Elemental chip power +10,Style’s element +10 more
◆ Special Abilities 2 ◆,x1.5 dmg from weaknesses,Immune to statuses
◆ Charge: Magic Flame ◆,Magic elemental flame,extends 3 panels ahead
It’s been a while，Alice.,Thank you for your help the,other day.
Your work has helped us get,a grasp on the true identity,of those hooded Navis.
I’ll be conducting a debriefing,on the matter on the second,floor of the Agent Center.
You’re not a NetAgent，but,I’d still like you to participate.
It’s okay if you can’t make it，,but please come to the Agent,Center if you can.
Excuse me，Mistress Shanghai.,I have something confidential,for your ears only.
Please come to where we ran,into each other in Undernet 2.
Dear Ms. Alice Shinki，,We sincerely thank you for,rescuing Princess Wriggelle.
As thanks for preserving the,friendship between Engelles,and the Insector Kingdom，
please accept this free,3-month air pass.
You can use this to fly to,Engelles as many times,as you like.
Simply show this email to,customs at the airport.
Please use this email when,you travel to Engelles., -Engelles Tourism Dept.
This mail is being sent,to all customers who were,present on the Siren.
Recently，an intruder,breached ship security and,gained unauthorized access.
The Siren will be out of,service while upgrades are,made to the security system.
Meanwhile，the ship will,remain open to the public,while anchored at port.
Be sure to stop by!,, -Genso Tourism
I have something I’d like to,speak with you about，,concerning Shanghai.
As it happens，I am at the,NetAgent center right now.
Would you mind coming by,when you have the chance?
The surgery will begin,soon!
Would you like to come,by to visit before they,start the surgery?
I’m sure it would mean,a lot to Satori,if you were there!
I heard from your friend,that you went to the,ROM base.
If that’s your decision，,I won’t stop you，but,hope with all my heart
for both of you to stay,safe. I’m sure you can,do it.
Take this AddOn，may,it serve you well.,I’m sure you can do it!
